pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Extreme Value Analysis with the Hierarchical Model of Reich and Shaby (2012) // Several procedures around a particular hierarchical model for extreme value: the HKEVP of Reich and Shaby (2012) DOI:10.1214/12-AOAS591. Simulation, estimation and spatial extrapolation of this model are available for extreme value data. A special case of this process is also handled: the Latent Variable Model of Davison et al. (2012) DOI:10.1214/11-STS376.
